article.title: Booz Allen Hamilton Receives Air Force Contract for Space J2 Analysis
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton has received a cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for $9.5 million from the U.S. Air Force. The contract will provide joint functional component command for space J2 survivability and vulnerability analysis. Offutt Air Force Base, Nebraska, is the contracting activity.
